jobDescription: Description: Are you a Business/Data Analyst with expertise in AML? We need you! Please! Collaborate with project managers, application managers, business managers, and the engineering and SQA team members.The ideal candidate will possess: Strong MS Office – Word, ExcelThe person who secures this position will: Analyze complex problems, derive options and solutions and present in an understandable manner to stakeholders, developers, testers and users at multiple levels.Act as a liaison with technology and business unit subject matter experts in support of Sanctions Screening projectSolicit information from business and IT SMEs about application functions, data and process flowsDocument application functions, data and process flows using prescribed template or fit-for-purpose formatParticipate in integration design process and provide detailed documentation and requirements Document reports required by system stakeholdersPresent requirement walkthrough to business, developers, and testers
